sections.heading: Waiver of notice6-418.Waiver of noticeWhenever notice is required to be given under this chapter, a waiver thereof in writing signed by the person or persons entitled to said notice shall be deemed equivalent thereto
sections.text: Waiver of notice6-418.Waiver of noticeWhenever notice is required to be given under this chapter, a waiver thereof in writing signed by the person or persons entitled to said notice shall be deemed equivalent thereto.
